info.name: ACS PE Course - Default
info.description:
This userstyle is only useful for ACS teachers, not students.  
It compresses the layout, reclaims unused space, and most importantly nails navigation and other links to the top of the browser window.  Don't install this userstyle by itself though - if you get one then you should get all of the "ACS PE Course" userstyles.
info.additionalInfo: M'dear teacher, you should install all the "ACS PY Course" styles (not just this one) at the same time because they all work together. If you install this userstyle alone then the main page will look as it should, but the layout on linked pages will be off.  For example, if you visit the Messages page, some page features may be obscured if you don't also have the "ACS PE Course- Messages" userstyle installed.
